channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Heart Of The Manor
channel.desc: On the eve of her sister's wedding, real estate agent Lisa must decide if developer Matthew Wallace holds the key to her heart.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sense And Sensibility
channel.desc: In this period adaptation of the Jane Austen classic, Marianne is torn between two potential suitors, while Elinor pines for a man beyond reach. Romantic drama.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Made for Each Other
channel.desc: A sculptor uses magic to mould her ideal man into reality, but trouble ensues when she begins to fall for her human friend.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Heiress And The Handyman
channel.desc: After losing her fortune, an heiress moves to a rural farm where she mistakes her handsome neighbour for the handyman who helps her compete at the county fair.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Wedding Wish
channel.desc: When a diehard romantic sets the date for her wedding despite being single, she sets out on a quest to find a fianc?. But could true love actually be right under her nose.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Learning To Love
channel.desc: Recently single Stephanie moves to Miami and takes a job working as a tutor. But when her love for their father grows, the two kids decide to put a stop to it.

channel.title: Our Take On Love
channel.desc: When fashion designer Isabella and filmmaker Blake work together to capture a love story from the past, they start to find romance in their present too.

channel.desc: When a professional bridesmaid books a high-profile wedding, she must keep her identity a secret not just from the guests, but also from the handsome reporter covering the event.

channel.desc: A mutual love of Jane Austen's stories causes an overly serious scholar and an actor playing Mr Darcy to fall head over heels into their own fairy tale romance.

channel.desc: When a book editor helps a mystery writer add a romantic skew to his novel, their fictional love story falls of the pages and into the real world.

channel.title: The Engagement Back-Up
channel.desc: Historian Luna must pretend to be engaged to a tech mogul's son to rescue her late father's naval museum. But could their make-believe love turn into something more.
